Inside TV blog, AP Simon Cowell said that he hasn't seen a full episode of "American Idol" since he left the program, reports EW.com's Inside TV blog. I've seen three minutes of a recap. From what I've seen and from what I've heard, it all seems to be going well. Sergio Marchionne is betting that the automaker's slate of 16 new and refreshed vehicles will help revive Chrysler, which nearly collapsed in 2009 before a government-funded bankruptcy.
